root.name: 1993tris
root.description: Overview1993tris is a puzzle game developed and published by Young K. Chung for the PC (DOS) platform. 1993tris was released as shareware, with only the first 2 of 18 levels being available until being registered.Despite the name being similar to Tetris, 1993tris has much more in common with the block matching games such as Columns or Puyo Puyo.GameplayIn 1993tris the players goal is to destroy a certain number of flies. Flies drop down into the play field in blocks of 2x2. The flies are colored, and can be killed by matching three or more of the same color together.There are also weapons that will fall down that the player can use by pressing the space bar or enter key.
